title: Somarven Arenas
desc: Rails API to be consumed by Somarven front-end. The API allows you to Do CRUD actions for arenas. Also can reserve an arena for a period of time, show or delete any of your reservations.

title: Air Police 1.0
desc: AirPloice a Mobile-first web application to check a list of countries Air Quailty index, and it's contents. Using OpenWeatherAirQuailty API that provides numeric data about each country, and present it in the app.

title: RuboFit - ChatBot
desc: RuboFit is a Telegram bot crafted with Ruby and Telegram Bot API along with atipugin/telegram-bot-ruby, Reminds you to break your inactivity during your coding sessions and other healthy stuff related to developers.

title: OreoCoin Blockchain
desc: A Blockchain ruby app to keep track of OreoCoin Cryptocurrency transactions or any type of data you want to track and record.

title: VScode Extension
desc: Alert before save any new code to check if the new code is following Pragmatice Programmer Book ETC principle

title: Mastermind Game
desc: a game where you have to guess your opponent's secret code within a certain number of turns

title: Mastermind Game
desc: A web data mining tool for seaching and extracting pdf files from PDFdrive.com, Crafted with Nokogiri (é‹¸) RubyGem and Ruby.

title: Memory Game
desc: Shuffle cards every game, Star rate system, Moves counter.
